description: Technology-related phrases for digital devices, internet, and modern communication

phrases.exampleSentence: Ar yra WiFi slaptažodis? Man reikia patikrinti el. paštą.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Is there a WiFi password? I need to check my email.

phrases.exampleSentence: Mano telefonas neveikia. Kur galiu jį sutaisyti?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: My phone is not working. Where can I get it repaired?

phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galiu įkrauti telefoną? Baterija beveik išseko.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can I charge my phone? The battery is almost dead.

phrases.english: How do I connect to the internet?
phrases.exampleSentence: Kaip prisijungti prie interneto? Reikia nusiųsti svarbų el. laišką.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: How do I connect to the internet? I need to send an important email.
The computer froze. How do I restart it?

phrases.english: Do you have an iPhone charger?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar turite kroviklį iPhone? Mano telefonas beveik išsikrovęs.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Do you have an iPhone charger? My phone is almost dead.

phrases.exampleSentence: Internetas labai lėtas šiandien. Ar galite patikrinti ryšį?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: The internet is very slow today. Can you check the connection?

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galite parodyti, kaip tai veikia?
phrases.english: Can you show me how this works?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galite parodyti, kaip tai veikia? Esu naujas su šia programa.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can you show me how this works? I'm new to this program.

phrases.english: I need to download an app
phrases.exampleSentence: Man reikia atsisiųsti programą vertimams. Kur galiu ją rasti?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I need to download a translation app. Where can I find it?
